Accordingly, a policy circular vide no_ 8.2.9/2021 dated 03.06.2021 was issued in this regard with delegation of power mentioned under para-4 of the circular. 2 Now, to expedite the approval process for declaring Financial Close of all PPP Projects, the following revised delegation of powers have been approved by Executive Committee in its 499th Meeting held on 06.01.2022: a_ For acceptance of documents and taking note of Financial Close without any deviation, with any interpretational issues, and within the time limit set for Financial Close prescribed in the Concession Agreement CGM (F): b For acceptance of documents beyond the time limit prescribed in the Concession Agreement with or without payment of damages Member (F) on recommendation of concerned Member . In any other cases Chairman, NHAI: 3_ All other   contents/ guidelines mentioned in policy circular no. 8.2.9/2021 dated 03.06.2021 is remain unchanged except to the extent as mentioned under para-2 above. 4 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 719|%/22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
